price: Por certo, na alternância da noite e do dia, e no que Allah criou nos céus e na terra, há sinais para um povo que teme a Allah.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ٱخۡتِلَٰفِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: inna fī ikh'tilāfi al-layli wal-nahāri wamā khalaqa al-lahu fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi laāyātin liqawmin yattaqūna
